participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and friendly, enjoys connecting with others.
participant_1.background: I like to write poetry. I'm a vegetarian. I used to be in the marines. I work as a bartender.

participant_2.name: Jovannie
participant_2.personality: Playful and imaginative, enjoys lighthearted activities.
participant_2.background: I love eating barbeque sandwiches and pizza puffs. I live down the street from Miley Cyrus and PnB Rock. My name is Jovannie and I'm 19. I enjoy hanging out with my imaginary friends as a hobby. My favorite show is Tom and Jerry.

content.text: Hi Jovannie, nice to meet you!
Hi! Nice to meet you too!
What do you do for a living?
I'm a student at the University of Louisville, and I'm studying business.
Oh, that's cool! I'm a bartender at a local bar.
Oh, that sounds fun! I've always wanted to be a bartender.
It's a lot of fun, but it can be tough work.
I'm sure it is. What's your favorite thing about being a bartender?
I love the interaction with the customers. I get to meet all sorts of interesting people.
That sounds like it would be really fun.
It is! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to watch movies, play video games, and hang out with my friends.
Oh, that sounds like me! I love to do all of those things too.
Great! I'll text you my number.
Cool! I'll text you mine too.
